title: Star Wars WatchFace
summary: Travel throught hyperspace with Stars Watch Face, inspired on Star Wars movies
description: Take your spaceship and travel arround the galaxy, Star Wars WatchFace was inspired on Star Wars films. Travel througth the hyperspace with a beautiful animation. You can tap on screen too to shooting laser against the evil empire.Main features for Stars Watchface:- Smoth hyperspace animation.- Digital 12 Hours format clock- Digital 24 Hours format clock- Battery optimization in Ambient mode- Short peek transparent card- **New interactive mode added, tap on the screen for shooting your laser gunAndroid Compatibles:- NOTE: Make sure your watch is running 5.0+- Stars Watch Face is compatible with the latest Android Wear devices
descriptionHTML:
Take your spaceship and travel arround the galaxy, Star Wars WatchFace was inspired on Star Wars films. Travel througth the hyperspace with a beautiful animation. You can tap on screen too to shooting laser against the evil empire.


Main features for Stars Watchface:
- Smoth hyperspace animation.
- Digital 12 Hours format clock
- Digital 24 Hours format clock
- Battery optimization in Ambient mode
- Short peek transparent card
- **New interactive mode added, tap on the screen for shooting your laser gun


Android Compatibles:

- NOTE: Make sure your watch is running 5.0+
- Stars Watch Face is compatible with the latest Android Wear devices
comments: Using iOS with an LG G Watch R on Android Wear 2.0 - lots of watch faces can be download directly from the watch now but not my favourite (this one!) sadly. Hoping for an update!
Very nice !!! This one's a keeper....any chance of making the lines disappear and also lowering the brightness of the clock a touch when it's in ambient mode....?, cheers...
I really like this but no 12 hour option so no 5 Star till it happens. As it is useless for me.
So cool! Really would like to see a 12 hr format for 5 stars!
I would give it a 5 if in 12 hour format.
12 hr please I love it, animation is awesome. Just wish I could switch it the 12 hour format
recentChanges: -Interactive Mode: Now when you tap the screen a laser shot go through the space "pchiuu" (Only avaliable on lastest android wear versions)
